user_query: I'm starting a new business and I need to create a customer database. Please provide me with the contact details for all my potential customers. Additionally, suggest some unique baby names for my friend's newborn.

TaskList.description: Gather potential customer contact details using a data source API.
Compile the contact details into a structured database format.
Fetch a list of unique baby names from a baby names database API.
Compile and present the unique baby names to the user.
